version_description:
1, optimize the iCloud management, close the start iCloud landing tips (thanks to the recommendations of the users);
2, close the transaction credentials repeatedly verified (thanks to the recommendations of users);
3, modify the character file opens, setting the pattern of dislocation;
4, amended with various pulls to edit time after flash back (converted from time to time after flash back, such as 1995 change in 1999). The problems mainly occurred in the IOS is below 9.0 System version.
5, optimize the file, manage the file interface and operation process, so that it is more convenient and more convenient;
6, the new help information file;

1, to beautify the interface, adjust the layout, add support for horizontal and vertical screen view character arrangement information;
2, to avoid the procedure of logic layer calculation error, comprehensive adjustment logic computing level, maximize avoid character analysis error, however, the calculation time is slightly prolonged;
3, to upgrade the "Tomb" attribute data layer, logic layer;
4, three, three will upgrade eight, three penalty, the calculated data and the logic layer;
5, eight and upgrade based computing data;
6, modify some typos and missing words (thanks to the recommendations of friends);
7, the new eight board about the order of adjustment; (thanks to the recommendations of friends);
8, new Dayun, fleeting, stream month full information list mode selection, better able to let users keep continuous thinking (thanks to friends suggestion,
9, the new file search, by name sort, by time sort, by gender, to facilitate the search file (thanks to the recommendation of friends).
10, fixed some satisfied tone, longevity showed dislocation of heavenly stems and earthly branches;
11, optimize the "function to explain" the use of words, to facilitate better understanding of the reader;

Lei: because of the impact of development schedule, the real solar time is temporarily closed.
Wei: correct the virtual avoidance and use words to express the word "Ji" instead of "avoid" and "fierce" to "use". It is expressed in the case of "avoid" with the red border of "avoid" in the case of jilt; the virtual use is expressed as the green border of "use" in the case of the murder; the God is mixed with the red frame of "mixed", and the God is mixed with the green frame of "mixed".
Emergency repair to open the old version of the file error;
1, the analysis and calculation of the eight characters are adjusted, the data analysis model is optimized. The analysis of the prosperity and failure is added to the analysis of the two-way (quantity judgment and strength judgment). When the user chooses the number to judge the prosperity and decline, it will be judged by the monthly command; when the user chooses the power to judge the prosperity and decline, the same sample is dominated by the monthly order and combined with strength factors. The accuracy of the eight character analysis is greatly improved by the judgement, which is relative to the judgement of Yu Ziping's theory.
2, add the true solar time display; add the new summer time reminder; replace the road before the operation to become a small transport; add the new fortune God Spirit.
3, optimize data structure, logic analysis, repair some of the calculation of the exact content;
4, modify the explanation function part of the wrong word;
5, the function of the transport area has been moved to the pattern area to prepare for the next step.
